description: Extensions and alterations to form a part two storey, part three storey building fronting onto Greenford Road and two storey building to rear to accommodate a 45 room apart-hotel with bar/restaurant (residents only) with associated landscaping, car & cycle parking and servicing area (following partial demolition of existing buildings).
decision_conditions: The proposal represents an over intensified use of the site which combined with the lack of parking  provision would be likely to result in a significant increase in on street parking  to the detriment of pedestrian and highway safety, and exacerbate car-parking stress in the area and would be detrimental to the amenities of the neighbouring properties, contrary to policies 4.1, 9.1 and 9.9 of the Council's adopted Unitary Development Plan (UDP), Policy 1.1 (g) and (j)  of the Council's adopted Development (or Core) Strategy; policies 7A and 7B of the draft Development Management Development Plan Document; and policies 6.3 and 7.15 of the London Plan; Spatial Development Strategy for Greater London.
